This is the @Once Protocol, version 1 draft.
start = *greeting update *traffic greeting = S:CHALLENGE C:AUTHENTICATE ( S:OK / S:NOPE ) update = C:GET-ENDPOINTS S:LIST-ENDPOINTS traffic = C:REMOTE-WHISPER / C:REMOTE-SHOUT
Version number (1)
Authentication challenge to be answered by a peer. One or more available authentication mechanisms. Challenge data.
Authentication response used to answer a challenge sent by a peer or the server. Chosen authentication mechanism. Challenge response data.
Get a list of peers connected to the server.
Send a list of peers connected to the server. List of peers.
Relay a whisper message through a bridge node. Remote peer. Message content.
Relay a shout through a bridge node. Remote group. Message content.
